name: test_e2e_with_logs[084_SQLI_ORDER_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ORDER_001` |
| **Name** | ORDER BY Subquery Injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | order_by_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `1 ORDER BY (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.tables)--`
- **Encoded**: `1%20ORDER%20BY%20(SELECT%201%20FROM%20information_schema.tables)--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~27000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:31:43.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
